Wish List

My wish list. List would be updated indefinitely.

Technical

  • Master at least one object oriented language
  • Master at least one functional language
  • Get 100 stars on a repository on Github
  • Win a reasonably sized hackathon
  • Intern at a startup[June/July 2016]
  • Publish a technical paper

Life

  • Celebrate birthday with total strangers
  • Buy a car
  • Preset in front of 100 people
  • Help someone achieve his/her dream

Travel

  • Visit a foreign country
  • Visit Silicon Valley
  • Visit Antarctica
